attributes.action: Lower the speed limit on single track country lanes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Single track country lanes should not have a speed limit of 60 mph. I regularly use one in Wales and am pushed to safely navigate the road faster than 30 - 35 mph, especially around "blind" bends. Two vehicles racing at each other around a blind bend on a single track road is just a recipe for a disaster. I think the national UK limit for these single track country lanes/roads should be revised down to 40mph at least!
